titles.title: "Maa, Iroiro to Rikutsu o Koneta Tokoro de, Todo no Tsumari wa Kimochi Hitotsu na Wake Desu ga" by Yue
After Much Quibbling, in the End All It Comes Down to Is How You Feel.
On a beau être raisonneur, c`est finalement le ressenti qui l`emporte.
「まあ, いろいろと理屈をこねたところで, とどのつまりは気持ちひとつなわけですが」by夕映
